mapper.select: select * from sj_practice_task where id=#{id}
select * from sj_practice_task where id=#{practice_id} order by begin_time desc
select * from sj_practice_task where task_type = 1
mapper.update: update sj_practice_task set state='2' where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from sj_practice_task where tea_id=#{tea_id} and grade=#{grade} and state='1' and task_type='3' and PARENT_ID=#{praID} order by begin_time desc
select * from sj_practice_task where TEA_ID in (select ID from sj_teacher where DEPT_ID=#{dept_id}) and(task_type = 1 or task_type = 2) and state='1'

select b.USER_ID,d.SCORE thesisscore,e.SCORE evaluatescore,sum(c.SCORE)/12 monthscore,f.ORG_NAME,g.TRUE_NAME,g.STU_CODE from sj_groups a,sj_group_members b,sj_month_summary c,sj_thesis d,sj_evaluate e,sj_org f,sj_student g where A.PRACTICE_ID=#{PRACTICE_ID} and a.id=b.group_id and LENGTH(b.user_id)=32 and f.ID=g.CLASS_ID and g.id=b.USER_ID and b.user_id=c.stu_id and b.user_id=d.stu_id and b.user_id=e.stu_id GROUP BY c.STU_ID
select * from sj_practice_task where TEA_ID in( SELECT ID FROM sj_teacher WHERE DEPT_ID =#{dept_id}) and task_type = #{task_type} and state='1' and grade=#{grade} order by BEGIN_TIME DESC
SELECT DISTINCT(GRADE) FROM sj_practice_task where TASK_TYPE in (1,2) order by GRADE ASC

SELECT * FROM sj_practice_task WHERE TEA_ID in (SELECT id FROM sj_teacher WHERE dept_id=#{dept_id}) AND GRADE=#{grade} AND STATE='1' AND ID NOT IN (SELECT PRACTICE_ID FROM sj_groups WHERE DISMISS_TIME is NULL)
SELECT * FROM sj_practice_task WHERE TEA_ID =#{tea_id} AND GRADE=#{grade} AND STATE='1' AND TASK_TYPE='2' AND ID NOT IN (SELECT PRACTICE_ID FROM sj_groups WHERE DISMISS_TIME is NULL)
select * from sj_practice_task where state='1' and id in (select b.PRACTICE_ID from sj_groups b join sj_group_members a on a.GROUP_ID=b.ID where a.USER_ID=#{user_id}) and task_type ='2'
select * from sj_practice_task where tea_id=#{tea_id} and grade=#{grade} and state='1' and task_type =1

SELECT * FROM sj_practice_task WHERE ID IN (SELECT PRACTICE_ID FROM sj_groups WHERE ID IN (SELECT GROUP_ID FROM sj_group_members WHERE USER_ID=#{tea_id})) AND STATE=1 AND GRADE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{year}, '%')

SELECT * FROM sj_practice_task WHERE ID IN (SELECT PRACTICE_ID FROM sj_groups WHERE ID IN (SELECT GROUP_ID FROM sj_group_members WHERE USER_ID=#{tea_id})) AND STATE=1 AND GRADE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{year}, '%') AND TASK_TYPE='1'

SELECT USER_ID FROM sj_group_members m, sj_groups g ,sj_practice_task t WHERE m.GROUP_ID=g.ID AND g.PRACTICE_ID=t.ID AND t.GRADE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{year}, '%') AND g.DISMISS_TIME is NULL AND length(USER_ID)=32 AND t.ID=#{id}
SELECT max(SubString(practice_code,-3)) FROM sj_practice_task where task_type='3'
SELECT * from sj_practice_task WHERE TEA_ID=#{tea_id} AND STATE=1 AND TASK_TYPE=1 order by begin_time DESC
select b.USER_ID from sj_groups a,sj_group_members b where a.id=b.GROUP_ID and length(b.user_id)=32 and a.practice_id=#{practice_id}
select b.USER_ID,c.* from sj_groups a,sj_group_members b,sj_student c where a.id=b.GROUP_ID and b.USER_ID=c.ID and length(b.user_id)=32 and a.practice_id=#{practice_id} ORDER BY c.STU_CODE
select b.USER_ID from sj_groups a,sj_group_members b where a.id=b.GROUP_ID and length(b.user_id)=32 and a.practice_id=#{practice_id} AND b.USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT STU_ID FROM sj_sign)
SELECT id FROM sj_practice_task WHERE SCOPE=#{org_id} AND STATE='1' AND GRADE=#{grade} AND TASK_TYPE='1'
SELECT * FROM sj_practice_task WHERE id=#{practice_id} AND STATE='1' AND task_type='2'
SELECT max(SubString(PRACTICE_CODE,-3)) FROM sj_practice_task where PRACTICE_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{pra_code},'%')

SELECT * FROM sj_practice_task WHERE ID in ( SELECT DISTINCT(PRACTICE_ID) FROM sj_groups WHERE ID in ( SELECT DISTINCT(GROUP_ID) FROM sj_group_members WHERE USER_ID=#{stu_id})) and TASK_TYPE=#{task_type} and STATE=1 order by begin_time DESC

select b.USER_ID from sj_groups a,sj_group_members b where a.id=b.GROUP_ID and length(b.user_id)=32 and a.practice_id IN (SELECT ID from sj_practice_task WHERE TEA_ID=#{tea_id} AND STATE=1 AND TASK_TYPE=1)
select DISTINCT grade from sj_practice_task where tea_id =#{tea_id} and task_type=1 and state=1 order by grade desc
select * from sj_practice_task where state='1' and id in (select b.PRACTICE_ID from sj_groups b join sj_group_members a on a.GROUP_ID=b.ID where a.USER_ID=#{user_id}) and task_type ='1'
select * from sj_practice_task where state='1' and id=#{praid}

SELECT a.TEA_ID FROM sj_practice_task a,sj_groups b WHERE b.PRACTICE_ID=a.ID AND b.GROUP_NAME IN( SELECT DISTINCT(GROUP_ID) FROM sj_student WHERE CLASS_ID IN( SELECT id from sj_org where PARENT_ID=#{org_id} and ORG_LEVEL='5' and BEGIN_TIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{grade} , '%') ))

SELECT COUNT(c.TRUE_NAME) FROM sj_summary_qnanswer a, sj_summary_questionnaire b ,sj_student c WHERE a.startdate>str_to_date(#{start_time}, '%Y-%m-%d ') AND a.startdate<str_to_date(#{end_time}, '%Y-%m-%d ') AND a.practiceTasksID=#{prc_id} AND b.endDate=#{now_time} AND a.score IS NOT null AND c.ID=a.user_id AND a.questionnaire_id=b.id
SELECT DISTINCT(TEA_ID) FROM sj_practice_task WHERE SCOPE in (SELECT id FROM sj_org WHERE PARENT_ID =#{org_id} or ID=#{org_id}) AND STATE="1" AND TASK_TYPE="1" and NOW()<END_TIME
SELECT ID FROM sj_practice_task WHERE TASK_NAME=#{task_name} AND STATE="1" AND TASK_TYPE="1"
